translation.en: [Stacy] All across the world, and maybe ever since the beginning of time,
translation.fr: Dans le monde entier, et peut-être depuis la nuit des temps,

translation.en: different cultures had different ways of celebrating a kid coming of age.
translation.fr: différentes cultures célèbrent le passage à l'âge adulte.

translation.en: There's the quinceañera.
-There's Sweet 16. -[indistinct laughter]
[Stacy] There's also something called land diving.
translation.fr: Quelque chose appelé le saut du Gol.

translation.en: My dad told me that in the Brazilian Amazon,
translation.fr: D'après mon père, en Amazonie brésilienne,

translation.en: there's this thing called a bullet ant initiation
where fire ants crawl all over your hands and bite you.
translation.fr: où des fourmis rouges te mordent les mains.

translation.en: And if you can handle the pain, you're ready to be a man.
translation.fr: Si tu supportes la douleur, tu deviens un homme.

translation.en: I told him if he thinks that sounds bad,
try being a girl in middle school.
[Stacy] Everyone has their own thing.
And we have ours.
[Stacy, narrating] At a Bar or Bat Mitzvah, when you're 13,
translation.fr: À une bar ou une bat-mitsva, à 13 ans,

translation.en: you step before friends, family, and elders of the temple and read from the Torah.
translation.fr: on lit la Torah devant les amis, la famille et les aînés de la synagogue.

translation.en: Then, there's usually a party.
translation.fr: Ensuite, souvent, il y a une fête.

translation.en: All right, mishpachah,
please say hello to our newest and most fabulous adult,
translation.fr: veuillez accueillir notre nouvelle et fabuleuse adulte,

translation.en: Stacy Friedman!
[Stacy, narrating] Your Bat Mitzvah is the first day of your adult life,
translation.fr: Ta bat-mitsva marque le début de ta vie d'adulte.

translation.en: and everyone knows an iconic adult life hinges on how it starts.
translation.fr: On sait qu'une vie d'adulte accomplie dépend de la façon dont elle commence.

translation.en: [Stacy, continuing] The theme.
-The food. -[girl] Can I get one?
translation.fr: - Le repas. - Je peux en avoir ?

translation.en: [Stacy] The entrance video.
It all tells a story. Who do I want to be?
translation.fr: Tout raconte une histoire. Qui je veux être ?

translation.en: Will I have amazing lifelong friends like Lydia Rodriguez Katz?
translation.fr: Aurai-je de super amis pour la vie comme Lydia Rodriguez Katz ?

translation.en: Nothing before that day matters because that was the old you, the kid you.
translation.fr: Avant ce jour-là, rien n'a d'importance. C'était l'ancien toi, la version enfant.

translation.en: Now you're an adult.
So who cares if two years ago you accidentally peed yourself
translation.fr: Peu importe s'il y a deux ans, tu t'es fait pipi dessus

translation.en: during a field trip and had to get a secret dry pants delivery
translation.fr: pendant un voyage scolaire et que ta sœur aînée

translation.en: from your awesome older sister Ronnie?
translation.fr: a dû te livrer en secret des habits.

translation.en: This is a hypothetical situation of course.
Go Stacy! That's my sister!
[Stacy] And what better way to kick off adulthood than with the hottest guy in seventh grade?
translation.fr: Comment mieux débuter l'âge adulte qu'au bras du garçon le plus sexy de 5e ?

translation.en: Andy, what are you doing?
Stacy, I've loved you since the first time I saw you in the temple's Purim Pageant.
translation.fr: Stacy, je t'aime depuis la première fois que je t'ai vue au spectacle de Pourim.

translation.en: You were the finest Queen Esther I ever laid eyes on.
translation.fr: Tu es la plus jolie reine Esther que j'aie jamais vue.

translation.en: Is it okay if I officially signify me being your boyfriend by giving you a kiss?
translation.fr: Acceptes-tu que je devienne officiellement ton petit ami en t'embrassant ?

translation.en: Consent given, Andy Goldfarb.
-[knocking on door] -[Bree] Stacy!
[Bree] Stacy, we're gonna be late. Let's go.
translation.fr: Stacy, on va être en retard. Allez.

translation.en: -[knocking on door] -[Bree] I know you can hear me.
[sighing] One second, I'm flossing like you tell me to!
translation.fr: Attends, je me lave les dents comme tu me l'as demandé !

translation.en: -Now I'm gurgling. -Well, hurry up!
-You too, Ronnie! -[Ronnie] I'm ready!
translation.fr: - Toi aussi, Ronnie ! - Je suis prête !

translation.en: You always say that. Never ready.
translation.fr: Tu dis ça, mais c'est jamais le cas.

translation.en: -Ugh. Fine you got me. I'm not ready. -[Danny] Yankees are winning.
translation.fr: - D'accord. Je suis pas prête. - Les Yankees gagnent.

translation.en: [Bree] That's what you're wearing?
Yeah, I don't even know who this kid is. I'm not gonna wear a suit.
translation.fr: Je connais pas ce gamin. Alors mettre un costume ?

translation.en: It's a junior high friend. We have to get to know those parents too.
translation.fr: C'est un lycéen. On doit fréquenter ces parents.

translation.en: I don't want to get to know 'em. I liked when they were little.
translation.fr: J'en ai pas envie. Je préférais avant.

translation.en: All we had to know was them and the trampoline park guy.
translation.fr: Rien que les filles et le type du parc.

translation.en: Ronnie, we're gonna be late!
I'll be ready when Stacy's ready, Mom. It's all good.
translation.fr: Je serai prête quand Stacy le sera.

translation.en: Hey, Andy, of course I'll share a matzo ball soup with you.
translation.fr: Andy, je veux bien partager des kneidleh avec toi.

translation.en: Hi, Andy. I like your yarmulke.
I didn't know you were going to the Bat Mitzvah tonight, that's cool.
translation.fr: Je savais pas que tu venais. C'est cool.

translation.en: Honey, what are you looking for?
I can't find my earring.
Oh, good luck. Keep looking, baby. Keep looking. Take your time.
translation.fr: Bonne chance. Continue de chercher. Continue. Prends ton temps.

translation.en: Stacy!
Sorry, I'm coming!
[Ronnie] Those are cool.
-Mom will never let you wear them, though. -[Stacy] She won't even notice.
translation.fr: - Maman te laissera pas les porter. - Elle les verra pas.

translation.en: And if she does, I'll put on a sad show for Dad.
translation.fr: Au pire, je ferai mon visage triste à papa.

translation.en: Oh, she'll notice. She'll hate them.
translation.fr: Elle les verra et les détestera.

translation.en: And Dad will feel bad, but ultimately be too afraid to stand up to Mom.
translation.fr: Papa se sentira mal, mais aura trop peur de lui tenir tête.

translation.en: I've known them longer than you.
translation.fr: Je les connais mieux que toi.

translation.en: Um, excuse me, what are those things on your feet?
translation.fr: Excuse-moi, c'est quoi, ces trucs à tes pieds ?

translation.en: Lydia's mom bought us each a pair, so we could twin.
translation.fr: C'est pour être assortie à Lydia.

translation.en: What's twin?
Wearing the same thing. It's very seventh grade.
translation.fr: Porter la même tenue. Un truc de 5e.

translation.en: Take them off. You look like a stripper.
-Mom, you can't say that. -Yeah, Mom. You're gonna get cancelled.
translation.fr: - Ça se dit pas - Oui. Tu vas être rejetée.

translation.en: Oh boy.
Take them off or lose your phone.
No, you can't. Just take them off.
[Bree] Everyone in the car.
Thirty seconds or there's going to be no food left at this thing.
translation.fr: Trente secondes ou il n'y aura plus rien à manger.

translation.en: You're the one who's not ready. We're ready.
-I don't know where my earring is. -Babe, did you look everywhere? Honestly?
translation.fr: - J'ai perdu ma boucle d'oreille. - Tu as bien cherché ?

translation.en: 'Cause if you look hard enough, you can find it.
translation.fr: En cherchant bien, tu peux la trouver.

translation.en: Why would you do that to me?
Because I knew the girls needed more time. I also… I don't want to go to this thing at all.
translation.fr: Les filles avaient besoin de temps. Et j'ai pas envie d'y aller.

translation.en: -[Bree] You guys are the worst. -Yeah. I love you. Okay.
Come on, Mom, just let her wear the shoes. It's not fair to Lydia to make her wear them by herself.
translation.fr: Laisse-la les porter. C'est injuste pour Lydia.

translation.en: Okay. You're going to hate them in two minutes.
translation.fr: D'accord. Tu vas les détester dans deux minutes.

translation.en: You're welcome.
Thank you. Love you.
-Whoa. Ow! -[woman] Stacy!
I'm coming! Ugh, fine.
[man] Move, child! [Stacy] Coming, sorry!
-[Bree] Oh yeah! -[Danny] Oh, nice job.
[Bree] Taking after Dad with the dress clothes and sneakers.
translation.fr: Comme papa, une robe et des baskets.

translation.en: [Danny] Comfort always comes first, sweetie.
-There she is! -[Bree] She's limping. Hi, sweetheart!
-[Stacy] Hi, Lyd! -Lydia, Lydia encyclopedia.
[Lydia] Hi, guys!
Nice shoes. You look super cute, Lydia.
Oh, thanks, Ron Ron. Stacy and I are twinning.
translation.fr: Merci. Stacy et moi, on est assorties.

translation.en: Hmm. Not anymore. [chuckling]
-You took yours off. -I got you.
-Oh, thank you. I couldn't feel my feet. -Mom and Dad know we're taking you?
translation.fr: - Je sentais plus mes pieds. - Tes parents sont au courant ?

translation.en: Well, I told my mom, and then she told Dad's lawyer, so we're good to go.
translation.fr: Je l'ai dit à ma mère qui l'a dit à l'avocat de papa.

translation.en: Nice!
Ugh! Dad, can you turn this song off? It's embarrassing.
translation.fr: Tu peux changer de chanson ? C'est gênant.

translation.en: Why is it embarrassing? No one's around to hear it.
Oh my God! You're humiliating me!
translation.fr: Bon sang ! Tu me fais honte !

translation.en: All right! I'll turn it off. Jesus.
I turned it off, guys! What are we still upset about?
translation.fr: C'est éteint ! Qu'est-ce qui va pas encore ?

translation.en: Their watching sad videos to see who can cry first.
translation.fr: Elles matent des vidéos tristes pour voir qui pleure en premier.

translation.en: You're trying to cry. That is so bizarre.
Ugh! You're so freaking good at this game. I hate it.
translation.fr: Tu es trop forte à ce jeu. Ça m'agace.

translation.en: Everybody in this house needs a shrink.
translation.fr: On a tous besoin d'un psy ici.

translation.en: Yeah, you need two.
Ten.
[chuckling] That's nice. Everyone be normal. We're going to temple.
translation.fr: Très drôle. Agissez normalement. On arrive à la synagogue.

translation.en: Here's your music.
[DJ] Make some noise, mishpachah!
It's Devin's B'nai Mitzvah!
They're becoming an adult. Let's hear it for Devin!
translation.fr: Iel va devenir adulte. Applaudissez Devin !

translation.en: We've been pushing all the teachers to assign more homework.
translation.fr: On a poussé les profs à donner plus de devoirs.

translation.en: If we want to prepare our kids for this world, we gotta start 'em early.
translation.fr: Si on veut préparer nos enfants, il faut commencer tôt.

translation.en: India's been kicking our ass.
-I'm always telling my son, Marvin-- -[Danny] I'm sorry.
translation.fr: - Je dis à mon fils… - Excusez-moi.

translation.en: Can I interrupt you for one second? I think this is on behalf of the table.
translation.fr: Je peux vous interrompre ? Je parle au nom de la table.

translation.en: We came here to enjoy chicken and fish tonight
translation.fr: On est venus manger du poulet et du poisson, ce soir,

translation.en: and maybe have a few drinks, so could you stop talking?
translation.fr: et boire quelques verres, alors pourriez-vous vous taire ?

translation.en: [Danny] Thank you.
This is such a classic. Have you watched Leprechaun in the Hood?
translation.fr: C'est un film culte. Vous avez vu Leprechaun 5 ?

translation.en: Dude, that's a masterpiece.
We know. We've seen it. It was awful. Can you just let us watch our movie?
translation.fr: On l'a vu. C'était horrible. Vous pouvez nous laisser ?

translation.en: Bye!
That hurt.
-We've seen that? -No.
Okay, I love this Carnivale theme,
but your Candyland theme is gonna be the best of the year.
translation.fr: mais ton Candy crush sera le meilleur.

translation.en: Oh, until your New York theme puts the entire school to shame!
translation.fr: Ton thème New York va faire baver toute l'école !

translation.en: If my parents let me have it. Did your dad talk to DJ Schmuley yet?
translation.fr: Si mes parents acceptent. Ton père a parlé à DJ Schmuley ?

translation.en: Let me hear you scream, "DJ Schmuley is my king!"
translation.fr: Je veux vous entendre crier : "DJ Schmuley est mon roi !"

translation.en: [crowd] DJ Schmuley is my king!
-He's already been booked. We got it! -Sweet!
Looking nice, ladies!
-[Lydia] Hi, guys. -Hi.
Can you believe we're becoming adults this year?
translation.fr: On devient adultes, vous y croyez ?

translation.en: -No. -[Nikki] Yeah.
My mom actually let me shave my legs this afternoon.
translation.fr: Ma mère m'a autorisée à me raser les jambes.

translation.en: First time. So magical.
Oh, I'm so proud of you, Nikki!
It burns so bad right now, like somebody wiped wasabi all over my shins.
translation.fr: Ça me brûle comme si j'avais du wasabi sur les tibias.

translation.en: Oh my God.
[Tara] Why do Kym, Anya, and Megan always look so cool?
translation.fr: Kym, Anya et Megan ont toujours l'air si cool…

translation.en: Are those birds rescued?
translation.fr: - Ce sont des oiseaux sauvés ? - Pardon ?

translation.en: -Say what? -They better be.
translation.fr: - Ce sont des oiseaux sauvés ? - Pardon ? Je l'espère.

translation.en: -They scare me. -Yeah, you know what else is scary?
Nikki's mom is allowing Ronnie and Zaara to drink alcohol!
translation.fr: La mère de Nikki qui autorise Ronnie et Zaara à boire de l'alcool !

translation.en: One, two, three. Woo!
-Okay, let me hide those. -[Ronnie coughing]
Yeah, she's trying to be like a cool mom. It's really weird.
translation.fr: Elle se la joue mère cool. C'est bizarre.

translation.en: [Andy] Let's go!
Oh my God, Andy Goldfarb looks so cute tonight.
translation.fr: Mince alors, Andy Goldfarb est trop canon ce soir.

translation.en: Do you realize that one day he will be mine,
translation.fr: Tu réalises qu'un jour il sera à moi, et que tu auras un copain cool aussi ?

translation.en: and you will have a cool boyfriend too,
translation.fr: qu'un jour il sera à moi, et que tu auras un copain cool aussi ?

translation.en: and then we'll have a joint wedding and move to adjoining lofts in Tribeca?
translation.fr: On se mariera en même temps et on sera voisines de loft ?

translation.en: In Taylor Swift's building?
-Yeah! -Yeah!
I'm gonna talk to him.
-[Lydia] What? -[Stacy] I'm ready.
You should, Stace. Yeah, you got this.
translation.fr: Tu devrais, Sissi. Oui, tu vas assurer.

translation.en: Come with me, please.
-Yeah. -Let's go.
Go, go, go. You got this.
Gang way!
Hey, wait for me!
-No! You're embarrassing me. -Yes!
translation.fr: - Non ! Tu me fais honte. - Oui !

translation.en: [Mateo] Hey, Stacy.
I like your kicks.
Andy, smile!
[girl] Finish him!
Why would Mateo do that? That was so uncalled for.
translation.fr: Pourquoi Mateo a fait ça ? C'était tellement déplacé.

translation.en: Oh, sorry.
Completely. Sorry.
Why does Andy hang out with that Italian exchange student anyway?
translation.fr: Pourquoi Andy traîne avec cet élève italien ?

translation.en: I think he's Ecuadorian.
Whatever. I heard he has a girlfriend back home. She's in college.
translation.fr: - Équatorien, non ? - Peu importe. Sa copine serait à la fac.

translation.en: Um, no. I think that's, like, illegal.
translation.fr: Non, je pense que c'est illégal.

translation.en: -Oh my God! -[crowd gasping]
-[Zaara] Sorry. -What's wrong with you?
translation.fr: - Pardon. - Ça va pas ? Pourquoi tu fais ça ?

translation.en: -Why would you do that? So embarrassing. -I'm sorry.
translation.fr: - Pardon. - Ça va pas ? Pourquoi tu fais ça ? Trop la honte.

translation.en: All right, everybody, make some noise!
translation.fr: C'est parti, les amis, faites du bruit !

translation.en: Come on, let's dance, everybody! Come on!
-[Schmuley] Let me hear you scream, Schmu… -[crowd] Ley!
translation.fr: - Je veux vous entendre crier : Schmu… - Ley !

translation.en: -Schmu-- -[crowd] Ley!
-Schmu, Schmu-- -[crowd] Ley!
Why does everybody like this idiot?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tout le monde adore cet idiot ?

translation.en: -He's the best! -The best.
-You've been officially Schmulitized! -[crowd cheering]
[Stacy] Thank you family for joining us today.
Let me take you all on a journey.
Picture this. My entrance video starts…
Which, as we know, sets the tone for the entire Bat Mitzvah.
translation.fr: Et nous savons tous qu'elle donne le ton.

translation.en: -[Stacy] Ugh, Ronnie! -Girls, come on.
Anyway, I descend the stairs of a private yacht on the Hudson River
translation.fr: Bref, je descends les marches d'un yacht privé sur l'Hudson

translation.en: to cheers and fireworks.
translation.fr: sous les cris et les feux d'artifice.

translation.en: Then! Oh, who's that zipping by on a jet ski?
translation.fr: Et là ! Qui passe devant en jet-ski ?

translation.en: Why that's international recording artist Olivia Rodrigo.
Wait, how we gonna pay for this? Oh, we have ideas.
translation.fr: - Et comment on va payer ? - On a des idées.

translation.en: They… they got ideas, honey.
[Lydia] Okay.
No. Wait. No. The old guy was supposed to be for your dad.
translation.fr: Non. Attends. Non. - Le vieux, c'est pour ton père. - Non. Avance.

translation.en: Oh no. Just keep going.
translation.fr: - Le vieux, c'est pour ton père. - Non. Avance.

translation.en: -There. -Okay.
Oh, this is amazing.
translation.fr: ÉCONOMIES POUR LA FAC C'est fou.

translation.en: -Shut up, Ronnie. -No, you shut up.
I'll kill you, Ronnie.
Not if I stab you first!
Oh, that's… that's nice.
Oh my God, this is important! I'm becoming a freaking woman, everyone!
translation.fr: Bon sang, c'est important ! Je deviens enfin une femme, là !

translation.en: Okay, woman. All you should worry about right now is your mitzvah project
translation.fr: Tu devrais surtout te préoccuper de ton projet de Mitsva,

translation.en: and practicing your Haftarah.
-[Bree] Mm-hmm. -That's not important!
I mean, it is important to you and other old people and God and stuff.
translation.fr: D'accord, c'est important pour vous, les vieux et Dieu.

translation.en: But to me, the party is important.
translation.fr: Pour moi, c'est la fête qui est importante.

translation.en: If this doesn't go well, I could end up like Kate Kossman.
translation.fr: Si ça se passe mal, je pourrais finir comme Kate Kossman.

translation.en: You are not gonna end up like Kate Kossman.
Who's Kate Kossman?
Oh, she had this terrible medieval themed Bat Mitzvah called Kate Kossman Knights,
translation.fr: Elle a fait une bat-mitsva intitulée la Kermesse de Kate Kossman,

translation.en: not realizing the initials spelled out KKK.
translation.fr: sans se rendre compte que ça donne KKK.

translation.en: Yeah, no, I could see that being a problem. Okay.
So now, she just sits alone in the cafeteria sewing friendship bracelets
translation.fr: Maintenant, elle fait des bracelets d'amitié seule

translation.en: for literally no one because she has no friends.
translation.fr: pour absolument personne, car elle n'a pas d'amis.

translation.en: That sounds a little dramatic.
Oh, so you think you shouldn't be punished for promoting the KKK.
translation.fr: Donc il ne faut pas être puni si on fait l'éloge du KKK ?

translation.en: Wow, Mom, didn't realize you supported racism.
translation.fr: J'ignorais que tu soutenais le racisme.

translation.en: Oh boy.
[Stacy] Hear me out.
You're always saying how my Bat Mitzvah determines the rest of my life.
translation.fr: Pour toi, ma bat-mitsva détermine le reste de ma vie.

translation.en: And I think Dua Lipa would make my life perfect.
translation.fr: Dua Lipa rendrait ma vie parfaite.

translation.en: No. No famous pop stars, no yachts, no sailboats even.
translation.fr: Pas de stars. Pas de yachts. Même pas de voiliers.

translation.en: That's so unfair! Ronnie got a baked potato bar at hers!
translation.fr: C'est injuste ! Ronnie a eu un bar à frites !

translation.en: Listen, when I got Bar Mitzvahed, we had a party in Grandma's basement.
translation.fr: On a fêté la mienne dans la cave de ma grand-mère.

translation.en: We all split, like, this giant matzo ball. That was the fun.
translation.fr: On a partagé un énorme kneidleh. On s'est amusés.

translation.en: You know what the theme was? Being Jewish.
translation.fr: Quel était le thème ? Être juif.

translation.en: Just practice your prayers and write your speech already.
translation.fr: Travaille tes prières et écris ton discours.

translation.en: Oh, I've been doing that Mr. Friedman. It's all covered.
translation.fr: Je m'en occupe, M. Friedman. Je gère.

translation.en: You're writing Stacy's speech?
translation.fr: Tu écris le discours de Stacy ?

translation.en: -You know I'm not good at writing. -English is her worst subject.
translation.fr: - Tu sais que j'écris mal. - C'est sa pire matière.

translation.en: It's really bad.
-Stacy, that is so not okay. -[Lydia] It's fine.
translation.fr: - Ça ne se fait pas. - Mais si.

translation.en: She's gonna do my entrance video. I know she'll crush it. Don't worry.
translation.fr: Elle va faire ma vidéo d'entrée. Elle va assurer. Ça ira.

translation.en: Can I at least have a virgin mojito bar?
translation.fr: Un bar à mojitos sans alcool ?

translation.en: You can have a ball pit.
Oh my God, Dad. That's for kids! I've had my period for seven months now!
translation.fr: Mince. C'est pour les gamins ! J'ai mes règles depuis sept mois.

translation.en: [chuckling] Wait, Stacy.
That's a long period, sweetheart!
You know what? I'm gonna head out.
I'll drive you.
[Lydia] Love you. See you in the morning.
Don't worry, Dad. It'll be okay.
translation.fr: Ne t'en fais pas. Tout ira bien.

translation.en: She's growing up so fast. It's crazy. [Ronnie] I'm drinking now.
translation.fr: - Elle grandit si vite. C'est fou. - Je bois maintenant.

translation.en: I tried it the other day. I didn't like it. We're good.
translation.fr: J'ai essayé l'autre jour. J'ai pas aimé. C'est réglé.

translation.en: [Stacy, narrating] Dear God, what's up?
Stacy Friedman here, but I guess you already know that.
translation.fr: C'est Stacy Friedman, mais tu le sais déjà.

translation.en: And I guess you already know what I'm going to say.
translation.fr: Et tu sais déjà ce que je vais dire.

translation.en: But just to be super safe, I'm going to say it anyway.
translation.fr: Mais par sécurité, je le dirai quand même.

translation.en: I would really, really appreciate it if I could have an amazing Bat Mitzvah.
translation.fr: J'aimerais vraiment avoir une super bat-mitsva.

translation.en: And I know I need to do my mitzvah project.
translation.fr: Oui, je dois me consacrer à mon projet.

translation.en: But isn't a mitzvah project supposed to be giving back in a way that represents me?
translation.fr: Mais un projet de Mitsva n'est-il pas censé me représenter ?

translation.en: Which is why I don't know what to do.
I mean, I'm not popular. I'm not a loser.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas populaire. Ni une ratée.

translation.en: I don't know who I am.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas qui je suis.

translation.en: But I do know, if I have a kick-ass Bat Mitzvah,
doors would open, and I can have a fab life on my own terms.
translation.fr: des portes s'ouvriront, et je pourrai avoir une vie fabuleuse.

translation.en: [woman] No. No famous pop stars.
[man] You can have a ball pit.
[Stacy] A ball pit? Lydia's gonna get everything she asked for.
translation.fr: Une piscine à balles ? Lydia aura tout ce qu'elle veut.

translation.en: Even a Twizzlers station for me.
translation.fr: Même un bar à réglisse pour moi.

translation.en: I'm starting to worry Mom and Dad don't get it, and the whole thing's gonna suck.
translation.fr: J'ai peur que mes parents ne pigent pas, et que ça soit nul.

translation.en: -[Stacy] You had her phone the whole time? -[Lydia] No, she was lying.
translation.fr: - Tu avais son téléphone ? - Non, elle mentait.

translation.en: -The audacity. -The monster.
Yeah.
-Can we sit outside? It's a nice day. -No.
translation.fr: - On sort ? Il fait beau. - Non.

translation.en: I mean, I definitely could use some color.
-Yeah, it's true. -Is that Tory Burch?
translation.fr: - C'est vrai. - C'est une Tory Burch ?

translation.en: Oh no, it's Walmart. I got this and a water bottle for only $12.
translation.fr: Non, ça vient de Walmart. Ça et une bouteille d'eau pour 12 dollars.

translation.en: I was talking to her.
M-me?
